title: UpdateHeres Why Our Diaspora Client Booked For Our Site Visit & Giving Him Expert Advice

tasks.task: Survey and Assess a New Agricultural Field
subtasks: Listen to the speaker introduce himself
Identify the location (Otu Kwejo, Nsanwem suburb)
Determine the purpose of the visit (surveying a new field for crop cultivation)
Confirm awareness of land ownership and community agreements
Note the land's history (used since 2012, previously farmed tomatoes, okra, and cassava, currently some cassava remains)
Acknowledge the presence of key trees (palm and coconut)
Assess the land's topography (some sloping areas, some flat)
Consider plans for water management (mini-dam for year-round water supply)
Understand the role of the team in providing guidance and customization for the client's investment
Recognize the commitment to not handling client's money directly
